LINER NOTES

If our clothes were records, these would be the notes inside background, inspiration, playlists, and our biweekly advice column, Hey Sid!

About

With the mission of enhancing peoples lives through clothes that make them feel great, we make quintessential menswear that doesnt take itself too seriously.

Discover our story

Services

We think serving people is cool so whether its full-service styling or simply hemming your jeans, consider us here to help.

See all services

Visit

Our brick-and-mortar shops are a place to pick up a pair of jeans but also to play ping-pong, listen to records, drink a Coke, and be properly taken care of in every way.
